mapper.sql: a.id, a.username, a.password, a.phone, a.email, a.created, a.updated
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_user ( username, password, phone, email, created, updated ) VALUES ( #{username}, #{password}, #{phone}, #{email}, #{created}, #{updated} )
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM tb_user AS a WHERE a.id = #{id}
mapper.update: update tb_user set username = #{username}, password = #{password}, phone = #{phone}, email = #{email}, created = #{created}, updated = #{updated} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select:
select
from tb_user a where a.username like CONCAT ('%',#{username},'%')

select
from tb_user a where a.email = #{email}

select
from tb_user a
OR a.username LIKE CONCAT ('%',#{username},'%')
